paragraphs.text: When I spoke to you last at Christmas, I asked to all whatever your religion to pray for me on the day of my coronation, to pray that God would give me wisdom and strength to carry out the promises that I should then be making.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /wɛn aɪ spəʊk tə juː lɑːst æt ˈkrɪsməs, aɪ ɑːskt tə ɔːl wɒtˈɛvə jɔː rɪˈlɪdʒən tə preɪ fɔː miː ɒn ðə deɪ əv maɪ ˌkɒrəˈneɪʃən, tə preɪ ðæt ɡɒd wʊd ɡɪv miː ˈwɪzdəm ænd strɛŋθ tə ˈkæri aʊt ðə ˈprɒmɪsɪz ðæt aɪ ʃʊd ðɛn biː ˈmeɪkɪŋ./

paragraphs.text: Throughout this memorable day, I have been uplifted and sustained by the knowledge that your thoughts and prayers were with me.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /θruːˈaʊt ðɪs ˈmɛmərəbəl deɪ, aɪ hæv biːn ʌpˈlɪftɪd ænd səsˈteɪnd baɪ ðə ˈnɒlɪdʒ ðæt jɔː θɔːts ænd preəz wɜː wɪð miː./

paragraphs.text: I have been aware all the time that my peoples spread far and wide throughout every continent and ocean in the world were united to support me in the task to which I have now been dedicated with such solemnity.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /aɪ hæv biːn əˈweər ɔːl ðə taɪm ðæt maɪ ˈpiːplz sprɛd fɑːr ænd waɪd θruːˈaʊt ˈɛvri ˈkɒntɪnənt ænd ˈəʊʃən ɪn ðə wɜːld wɜː juːˈnaɪtɪd tə səˈpɔːt miː ɪn ðə tɑːsk tə wɪtʃ aɪ hæv naʊ biːn ˈdɛdɪkeɪtɪd wɪð sʌtʃ səˈlɛmnɪti./

paragraphs.text: Many thousands of you came to London from all parts of the Commonwealth and Empire to join in the ceremony, but I have been conscious too of the millions of others who have shared in it by means of wireless or television in their homes.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ˈmɛni ˈθaʊzəndz əv juː keɪm tə ˈlʌndən frɒm ɔːl pɑːts əv ðə ˈkɒmənwelθ ænd ˈɛmpaɪə tə dʒɔɪn ɪn ðə ˈsɛrɪməni, bʌt aɪ hæv biːn ˈkɒnʃəs tuː əv ðə ˈmɪljənz əv ˈʌðəz huː hæv ʃeəd ɪn ɪt baɪ miːnz əv ˈwaɪəlɪs ɔː ˈtɛlɪvɪʒən ɪn ðeə həʊmz./

paragraphs.text: All of you near or far have been united in one purpose.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ɔːl əv juː nɪər ɔː fɑː hæv biːn juːˈnaɪtɪd ɪn wʌn ˈpɜːpəs./

paragraphs.text: It is hard for me to find words in which to tell you of the strength which this knowledge has given me.

analysis.purpose: Express the impact of support on her
analysis.ipa_transcription: /ɪt ɪz hɑːd fɔː miː tə faɪnd wɜːdz ɪn wɪtʃ tə tɛl juː əv ðə strɛŋθ wɪtʃ ðɪs ˈnɒlɪdʒ hæz ˈɡɪvən miː./

paragraphs.text: The ceremonies you have seen today are ancient and some of their origins are veiled in the mists of the past, but their spirit and their meaning shine through the ages, never perhaps more brightly than now.

analysis.purpose: Highlight the significance of the ceremony
analysis.ipa_transcription: /ðə ˈsɛrɪməniz juː hæv siːn təˈdeɪ ɑːr ˈeɪnʃənt ænd sʌm əv ðeər ˈɒrɪdʒɪnz ɑː veɪld ɪn ðə mɪsts əv ðə pɑːst, bʌt ðeə ˈspɪrɪt ænd ðeə ˈmiːnɪŋ ʃaɪn θruː ðə ˈeɪdʒɪz, ˈnɛvə pəˈhæps mɔː ˈbraɪtli ðæn naʊ./

paragraphs.text: I have in sincerity pledged myself to your service as so many of you are pledged to mine.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /aɪ hæv ɪn sɪnˈsɛrɪti plɛdʒd maɪˈsɛlf tə jɔː ˈsɜːvɪs æz səʊ ˈmɛni əv juː ɑː plɛdʒd tə maɪn./

paragraphs.text: Throughout all my life and with all my heart, I shall strive to be worthy of your trust.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /θruːˈaʊt ɔːl maɪ laɪf ænd wɪð ɔːl maɪ hɑːt, aɪ ʃæl straɪv tə biː ˈwɜːði əv jɔː trʌst./

paragraphs.text: In this resolve, I have my husband to support me.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ɪn ðɪs rɪˈzɒlv, aɪ hæv maɪ ˈhʌzbənd tə səˈpɔːt miː./

paragraphs.text: He shares all my ideals and all my affection for you.

analysis.purpose: Emphasize shared values with her husband
analysis.ipa_transcription: /hiː ʃeəz ɔːl maɪ aɪˈdɪəlz ænd ɔːl maɪ əˈfɛkʃən fɔː juː./

paragraphs.text: Then, although my experience is so short and my task so new, I have in my parents and grandparents an example which I can follow with certainty and with confidence.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ðɛn, ɔːlˈðəʊ maɪ ɪkˈspɪəriəns ɪz səʊ ʃɔːt ænd maɪ tɑːsk səʊ njuː, aɪ hæv ɪn maɪ ˈpeərənts ænd ˈɡrænpeərənts ən ɪɡˈzɑːmpəl wɪtʃ aɪ kæn ˈfɒləʊ wɪð ˈsɜːtənti ænd wɪð ˈkɒnfɪdəns./

paragraphs.text: There is also this. I have behind me not only the splendid traditions and the annals of more than a thousand years, but the living strength and majesty of the Commonwealth.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ðeər ɪz ˈɔːlsəʊ ðɪs. aɪ hæv bɪˈhaɪnd miː nɒt ˈəʊnli ðə ˈsplɛndɪd trəˈdɪʃənz ænd ði ˈænəlz əv mɔː ðæn ə ˈθaʊzənd jɪəz, bʌt ðə ˈlɪvɪŋ strɛŋθ ænd ˈmædʒɪsti əv ðə ˈkɒmənwelθ./

paragraphs.text: An empire of societies old and new of lands and races different in history and origins, but all by God's will united in spirit and in aim.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ən ˈɛmpaɪər əv səˈsaɪətiz əʊld ænd njuː əv lændz ænd ˈreɪsɪz ˈdɪfərənt ɪn ˈhɪstəri ænd ˈɒrɪdʒɪnz, bʌt ɔːl baɪ ɡɒdz wɪl juːˈnaɪtɪd ɪn ˈspɪrɪt ænd ɪn eɪm./

paragraphs.text: Therefore, I am sure that this my coronation is not the symbol of a power and a splendor that are gone, but a declaration of our hopes for the future.

analysis.purpose: Frame the coronation as a hopeful milestone
analysis.ipa_transcription: /ˈðeəfɔː, aɪ æm ʃʊə ðæt ðɪs maɪ ˌkɒrəˈneɪʃən ɪz nɒt ðə ˈsɪmbəl əv ə ˈpaʊər ænd ə ˈsplɛndə ðæt ɑː ɡɒn, bʌt ə ˌdɛkləˈreɪʃən əv ˈaʊə həʊps fɔː ðə ˈfjuːtʃə./

paragraphs.text: And for the years I may, by God's grace and mercy, be given to reign and serve you as your queen.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ænd fɔː ðə jɪəz aɪ meɪ, baɪ ɡɒdz ɡreɪs ænd ˈmɜːsi, biː ˈɡɪvən tə reɪn ænd sɜːv juː æz jɔː kwiːn./

paragraphs.text: I have been speaking of the vast regions and varied peoples to whom I owe my duty, but there has also sprung from our island home a theme of social and political thought which constitutes our message to the world.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /aɪ hæv biːn ˈspiːkɪŋ əv ðə vɑːst ˈriːdʒənz ænd ˈveərid ˈpiːplz tə huːm aɪ əʊ maɪ ˈdjuːti, bʌt ðeə hæz ˈɔːlsəʊ sprʌŋ frɒm ˈaʊər ˈaɪlənd həʊm ə θiːm əv ˈsəʊʃəl ænd pəˈlɪtɪkəl θɔːt wɪtʃ ˈkɒnstɪtjuːts ˈaʊə ˈmɛsɪdʒ tə ðə wɜːld./

paragraphs.text: And through the change in generations has found acceptance both within and far beyond my realms.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ænd θruː ðə tʃeɪndʒ ɪn ˌdʒɛnəˈreɪʃənz hæz faʊnd əkˈsɛptəns bəʊθ wɪˈðɪn ænd fɑː bɪˈjɒnd maɪ rɛlmz./

paragraphs.text: Parliamentary institutions with their free speech and respect for the rights of minorities and the inspiration of a broad tolerance in thought and its expression all this we conceive to be a precious part of our way of life and outlook.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ˌpɑːləˈmɛntəri ˌɪnstɪˈtjuːʃənz wɪð ðeə friː spiːtʃ ænd rɪˈspɛkt fɔː ðə raɪts əv maɪˈnɒrɪtiz ænd ði ˌɪnspəˈreɪʃən əv ə brɔːd ˈtɒlərəns ɪn θɔːt ænd ɪts ɪkˈsprɛʃən ɔːl ðɪs wiː kənˈsiːv tə biː ə ˈprɛʃəs pɑːt əv ˈaʊə weɪ əv laɪf ænd ˈaʊtlʊk./

paragraphs.text: During recent centuries this message has been sustained and invigorated by the immense contribution in language, literature and action of the nations of our Commonwealth overseas.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ˈdjʊərɪŋ ˈriːsənt ˈsɛntʃəriz ðɪs ˈmɛsɪdʒ hæz biːn səsˈteɪnd ænd ɪnˈvɪɡəreɪtɪd baɪ ði ɪˈmɛns ˌkɒntrɪˈbjuːʃən ɪn ˈlæŋɡwɪdʒ, ˈlɪtərɪtʃər ænd ˈækʃən əv ðə ˈneɪʃənz əv ˈaʊə ˈkɒmənwelθ ˌəʊvəˈsiːz./

paragraphs.text: It gives expression as I pray it always will to living principles sacred to the crown and monarchy as to its many parliaments and peoples.

analysis.purpose: Reinforce the importance of shared principles
analysis.ipa_transcription: /ɪt ɡɪvz ɪkˈsprɛʃən æz aɪ preɪ ɪt ˈɔːlweɪz wɪl tə ˈlɪvɪŋ ˈprɪnsəplz ˈseɪkrɪd tə ðə kraʊn ænd ˈmɒnəki æz tə ɪts ˈmɛni ˈpɑːləmənts ænd ˈpiːplz./

paragraphs.text: I ask you now to cherish them and practice them too.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /aɪ ɑːsk juː naʊ tə ˈtʃɛrɪʃ ðəm ænd ˈpræktɪs ðəm tuː./

paragraphs.text: Then we can go forward together in peace seeking justice and freedom for all men.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ðɛn wiː kæn ɡəʊ ˈfɔːwəd təˈɡeðər ɪn piːs ˈsiːkɪŋ ˈdʒʌstɪs ænd ˈfriːdəm fɔːr ɔːl mɛn./

paragraphs.text: As this day draws to its close I know that my abiding memory of it will be not only the solemnity and beauty of the ceremony but the inspiration of your loyalty and affection.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /æz ðɪs deɪ drɔːz tə ɪts kləʊz aɪ nəʊ ðæt maɪ əˈbaɪdɪŋ ˈmɛməri əv ɪt wɪl biː nɒt ˈəʊnli ðə səˈlɛmnɪti ænd ˈbjuːti əv ðə ˈsɛrɪməni bʌt ði ˌɪnspəˈreɪʃən əv jɔː ˈlɔɪəlti ænd əˈfɛkʃən./

paragraphs.text: I thank you all from a full heart.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /aɪ θæŋk juː ɔːl frɒm ə fʊl hɑːt./

paragraphs.text: God bless you all.

analysis.ipa_transcription: /ɡɒd blɛs juː ɔːl./

contemporary_relevance.1953_context: Post-war rebuilding, emergence of the Commonwealth
